alert: Prescription denied: Drug not on formulary and no prior authorization found. Member or provider must initiate appeal.

steps.title: Step 1.1
steps.description: Confirm member's pharmacy benefit eligibility on claim date

steps.title: Step 1.2
steps.description: Identify prescribed drug and NDC code

steps.title: Step 1.4
steps.description: Drug marked as non-formulary: initiate PA lookup

steps.title: Step 2.1
steps.description: No active prior authorization found for this medication

steps.title: Step 2.2
steps.description: Check for alternative formulary drugs covered under same therapeutic class

steps.title: Step 2.3
steps.description: No equivalent alternatives found in claim notes

steps.title: Step 3.1
steps.description: Reject claim with denial code 75: 'Prior Authorization Required'

steps.title: Step 3.2
steps.description: Generate alert for member and prescriber on required PA process
